operations.name: Create Back In Stock Notification Request

params.name: request
params.doc: Notification request data (id is ignored, as it's generated by server)

operations.name: Delete Back In Stock Notification Request

docs.summary: Shows which catalogs have configured automation flow for current store

operations.name: Get Back In Stock Notification Request
Query Back In Stock Notification Requests

docs.summary: Returns BackInStockNotificationRequests matching given search parameters

params.name: catalogReference
params.doc:
Item identifier. All BackInStockNotificationRequests for this item identifier will be processed.
 Cannot be used with `request_ids`.

params.name: requestIds
params.doc:
Identifiers of BackInStockNotificationRequest that need to be handled.
 Cannot be used with `catalog_reference`.

params.name: automationTemplateParameters
params.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Key-value pairs that will fill notification email template (item name, image url ...)

docs.summary:
Will handle all BackInStockNotificationRequests referencing given item (if `catalog_reference` parameter is present)
 Otherwise (if `request_ids` parameter present) will handle BackInStockNotificationRequests with given ids

messages.name: _wix_common_Paging
messages.displayName: Paging Object

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load

members.name: offset
members.doc: number of items to skip in the current sort order

messages.name: _wix_common_CursorPaging
messages.displayName: Cursor Paging Object

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load

members.name: cursor
members.doc: Cursor returned in last query response. Should not be provided on first page request

messages.name: _wix_common_Cursors
messages.displayName: Cursors Object

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next result page

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous result page

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by

messages.name: _com_wix_ecommerce_commons_api_PlatformQuery
messages.displayName: Platform Query Object

messages.name: _com_wix_ecommerce_commons_api_PlatformQuery_pagingMethod
messages.displayName: paging Method Object

members.name: paging
members.doc: Pointer to page of results using offset. Can not be used together with 'cursorPaging'

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor pointing to page of results. Can't be used together with 'paging'. 'cursorPaging.cursor' can not be used together with 'filter' or 'sort'

messages.name: _com_wix_ecommerce_commons_api_PlatformPagingMetadata
messages.displayName: Platform Paging Metadata Object

members.name: count
members.doc: The number of items returned in this response

members.name: offset
members.doc: The offset which was requested. Returned if offset paging was used

members.name: total
members.doc: The total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging was used

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through result pages. Returned if cursor paging was used

docs.summary:

  • RECEIVED - initial status of all new requests
  • PROCESSING
  • DONE
  • FAILED
